credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Man with a Scythe
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a man with a scythe under his left arm in the foreground and a thinly-painted grouping of two men, with rake, pitch fork, and child in right background, all walking across a sloping meadow at dusk.  Grouping of large trees at left middleground, between the foreground meadow and wheat field, which leads to a blue range of hills in the background and a pale afterglow in the sky.
name: Painting
